up: CREATE TABLE products(create_time DATETIME COMMENT 'Create Time', delete_time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Date and Time record was deleted', id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Primary Key', touched_by VARCHAR(36) COMMENT 'User that touched the record last', update_time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Update Time', active BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Active', goa_member_only BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'GOA Members Only', currency VARCHAR(128) COMMENT 'Currency', product_analysis JSON COMMENT 'Product Analysis', product_code VARCHAR(255) COMMENT 'Product Code', product_description VARCHAR(12000) COMMENT 'Product Description', product_name VARCHAR(255) COMMENT 'Product Name', product_options JSON COMMENT 'Product Options', categories JSON COMMENT 'Product Categories', imgs JSON COMMENT 'Product Images', stock_level TINYINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'Stock Level', sharing_goa_member VARCHAR(255) COMMENT 'Sharing G.O.A. Member', sharing_goa_farm VARCHAR(255) COMMENT 'Sharing G.O.A Farm', max_quantity INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT 'Max Quantity Allowed') COMMENT 'product details';
